name: Space War (itch) (GiancarloT)
description:
You will need a friend to play with for this game!
All controls are in the game but here they are :

Player 1: W = Go / A = Turn Left / D = Turn Right / F = Shoot

Player 2: ↑ = Go / ← = Turn Left / → = Turn Right / Shift = Shoot

To eliminate the other player, hit them with your shot or make contact with the sun.


Music used: Retro Music
